metadata.title: CVE-2018-20574 yaml-cpp: DoS in SingleDocParser::HandleFlowMap function (low)
metadata.description:
STATEMENT: This issue affects the versions of rh-mongodb32-yaml-cpp, rh-mongodb34-yaml-cpp, and rh-mongodb36-yaml-cpp as shipped with Red Hat Software Collections. However, this is only used to parse configuration files.

Red Hat Satellite 6.5 ship yaml-cpp however has been rated as a security impact of Low, product version Satellite 6.6 onward is not affected. Satellite 6.5 is in Maintenance Support phase of the product life cycle and is not currently planned to be addressed in future updates. For additional information, refer to the Red Hat Satellite 6 Life Cycle: https://access.redhat.com/support/policy/updates/satellite.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
yaml-cpp-devel is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
